game.name: Masha Cooking Tortilla Pizza
game.description:
Masha loves pizza a lot and, for this reason, she searches for this dish everywhere she goes. The good news is that she has decided to prepare it tonight under your supervision. In the first place, you will have to help her to purchase the groceries from the nearest supermarket before starting this free online cooking game for girls. There are lots of preparations you need to do when you play Masha Cooking Tortilla Pizza. The unique crunchiness attached with the recipe will leave you wanting more. 

This little girl is young enough to perform this job. Help her to finalize a tortilla wrap instead of making the dough from scratch. Take it and place it on a wooden board and make sure that you also have spread some delicious marinara sauce on top of it. Garlic gets more delicious with tomatoes, so also add some pesto to it. Use the grated cheese to cover the entire pizza. It is also your job to add some needful toppings: olives, salami, tomatoes and peppers. 

Give your pizza a spicy taste by mixing some pepper and salt with it. Complete your job with oregano. Now you will have to put the created pizza in a tray to be baked properly. Get ready now to check out the delicious Tortilla pizza in this brand new cooking game for girls and boys. We hope your efforts will go well in making Masha feel happy. Good luck kids to enjoy this best kitchen game and have lots of fun!
